chav1961.purelib.streams

Class JsonStaxPrinter

  • java.lang.Object
    • chav1961.purelib.streams.JsonStaxPrinter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    public class JsonStaxPrinter
extends Object
implements Closeable, Flushable

    This class implements a StAX-styled JSON printer to use in the in-stream JSON uploading application.

    JSON format is according to RFC 7159

    This class is not thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.0.2
    Author:
    Alexander Chernomyrdin aka chav1961
    See Also:
    RFC 7159, JUnit tests
